New Records: Christian Bethancourt drove in seven runs, including a go-ahead two-run single in the ninth inning, and hit a home run (431 feet).
Key Match Events: Christian Bethancourt's two-run single in the ninth inning turned the game in favor of the Cubs. Brian Reynolds homered in the first inning for the Pirates.
Post-Match Reflections: The Cubs won the series 3-0, securing a dominant victory over the Pirates.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at PNC Park in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, with an attendance of 12,660 fans. The Cubs' Paul Skenes had a strong pitching performance with 5 strikeouts and a 2.23 ERA.
